Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, just west of Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of Netherworld Lane, you can see the back side of a small shopping complex. The entrance to the complex is probably on the other side of the building. To the south, there is a large building with a moderate-sized gem hovering about it. When the sun hits the gem, it radiates a brilliant purple glow over the entire building and some of the adjacent streets.
